speaker: Maya (Manager)
transcript: Thanks for coming in, Ben. Go ahead and close the door.

speaker: Maya (Manager)
transcript: Everything's fine. I just... wanted to do our quarterly check-in. (pause) Formally.

speaker: Ben (Developer)
transcript: Oh, right. The check-in. (clears throat) Good. Let's... do it.

speaker: Maya (Manager)
transcript: So. (sound of papers shuffling) Let's see. Q3. Your... output was... very high.

speaker: Ben (Developer)
transcript: I try. I had a... a lot of motivation this quarter.

speaker: Maya (Manager)
transcript: The... (laughs) ...the board was very impressed with the 'Project Apollo' launch.

speaker: Ben (Developer)
transcript: Well, *we* did a lot of 'after-hours' work on that one. It was... challenging.

speaker: Maya (Manager)
transcript: Yes. It was. (pause) We... really need to talk about that presentation in... Rome.

speaker: Ben (Developer)
transcript: Rome. Right. The... the hotel is booked. I confirmed it.

speaker: Maya (Manager)
transcript: And... the... itinerary? For the... weekend?

speaker: Ben (Developer)
transcript: All set. I took care of it. Don't worry.

speaker: (Sound of a loud knock on the door)
Maya (Manager)
transcript: Just... keep up the good work, Ben. Your performance is... exemplary. That's all.

speaker: Ben (Developer)
transcript: Understood. Thanks, Maya. See you... later.
